normalised: **Electric Vehicle Charging Gets a Bollywood Jhatka!**

unnormalised: Mumbai – Forget petrol pumps, folks! The EV charging scene is heating up faster than Madhuri Dixit's dance moves in *Dil Toh Pagal Hai*.
normalised: Mumbai – Forget petrol pumps, folks! The electric vehicle charging scene is heating up faster than Madhuri Dixit's dance moves in *Dil Toh Pagal Hai*.

unnormalised: IIT-Bombay is reportedly working on next-gen battery tech, promising faster charging times. Imagine, charging your Tata Nexon EV while sipping chai at a local tapri.
normalised: I I T-Bombay is reportedly working on next-gen battery tech, promising faster charging times. Imagine, charging your Tata Nexon Electric Vehicle while sipping chai at a local tapri.

unnormalised: Recent reports indicate a surge in charging station installations across the country, from Delhi to Chennai. Bharat Petroleum is planning to add charging points at all its petrol pumps. Good news for long drives, eh?
normalised: Recent reports indicate a surge in charging station installations across the country, from Delhi to Chennai. Bharat Petroleum is planning to add charging points at all its petrol pumps. Good news for long drives, eh?

unnormalised: Delhiites can expect more charging points popping up near metro stations soon. This will make those long commutes even easier than catching the local train.
normalised: Delhiites can expect more charging points popping up near metro stations soon. This will make those long commutes even easier than catching the local train.

unnormalised: Plus, charging tariffs are expected to become more competitive, with companies vying to offer the best rates. Some providers are even experimenting with subscription models, like a monthly 'recharge' pack for your ride!
normalised: Plus, charging tariffs are expected to become more competitive, with companies vying to offer the best rates. Some providers are even experimenting with subscription models, like a monthly 'recharge' pack for your ride!

unnormalised: So, ditch the range anxiety. EV life in India is getting electrifying! More updates coming soon! Stay tuned for more updates.
normalised: So, ditch the range anxiety. Electric Vehicle life in India is getting electrifying! More updates coming soon! Stay tuned for more updates.
